alert.note: Alert for Lake Casitas; Ojai Valley; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast; Santa Ynez Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued January 07 at 5:04AM PST until January 08 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, areas of northwest to north winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph are expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 degrees are possible. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast, Santa Ynez Valley, Lake Casitas and Ojai Valley. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 7 PM PST this evening. For the Freeze Watch, from late tonight through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Plan for extra time to defrost vehicle windshields.

area.areaDesc: Lake Casitas; Ojai Valley; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast; Santa Ynez Valley
